participant_1.background:
I remember playing with my raincoat-wearing toys in the rain.
i play games at the arcade , still.
my husband was a salesman.
I am passionate about civic engagement and making my voice heard.
i am eighteen years old.

participant_2.background:
I value my privacy most of all.
i am a professional skittles player.
I celebrated my birthday with my family and friends by listening to Taylor Swift's music and eating my favorite foods.
I live in a city where I can always find a basketball court.
i can speak four languages fluently.

content.text: Hi there! How are you today?
Hello! Doing well thanks. How about you?
I'm doing well too, thanks! I'm excited to talk to you today.
I'm excited to talk to you too! What would you like to talk about?
Well, I wanted to ask you about your job as a professional skittles player.
Oh, that's a great question! I'm actually really passionate about my job. I love the competitive nature of it, and I love the challenge of always trying to improve my skills.
That's really cool! It sounds like you really enjoy your job.
I do! I'm so lucky to be able to do something I love so much.
That's great! So, what's the best part of your job?
The best part is probably the travel. I get to travel all over the world to compete in tournaments. It's so much fun to see new places and meet new people.
That sounds really exciting! I've always wanted to travel more.
You should! It's so much fun.
I'll definitely have to do that sometime.
You should! It's a great way to experience new cultures and make new friends.
Thanks for the advice! I'll definitely keep that in mind.
No problem! So, what else would you like to know?
Well, I was wondering what your favorite food is.
My favorite food is probably pizza. I love the combination of salty and sweet.
Pizza is delicious! I love pizza too.
Me too! It's my favorite food.
Well, I'm glad we agree on something!
Me too! So, what else would you like to know?
I think that's all I have for now.
Okay! It was nice talking to you.
You too! Have a good day!
You too!
